sentences.en: Everybody was in a very relaxed and jolly mood.
sentences.cn: 大家的心情都非常轻松愉快。

sentences.en: He can cook, and he does it jolly well.
sentences.cn: 他会做饭, 并且做得特别好.

sentences.en: He had a red face and a loud voice and jolly ways.
sentences.cn: 他红脸膛儿,大嗓门,一天到晚乐呵呵的.

sentences.en: He was the same jolly, enlivening soul.
sentences.cn: 他仍然是那么欢乐, 令人开心.

sentences.en: I'd got myself into this marriage and I jolly well had to get myself out of it.
sentences.cn: 是我让自己陷入到这场婚姻中，我也一定要让自己从其中脱身。

sentences.en: I'm going to keep on eating as much sugar as I jolly well like.
sentences.cn: 我会继续自己想要吃多少糖就吃多少。

sentences.en: It was all jolly good fun.
It was jolly hard luck on him, wasn't it?
It was jolly hard work, but I loved it.
sentences.cn: 这可是件很苦的差事，不过我喜欢。

sentences.en: She had a very jolly time in Korea.
She was jolly good at jigsaws.
She was jolly well not going to let them get away with it.
sentences.cn: 她肯定不会在这件事上就这么放过他们。

sentences.en: Sounds like a jolly good idea to me.
That day they got together and had a jolly time.
sentences.cn: 那天他们聚在一起热闹了一番.

sentences.en: We can hardly just tell him what we jolly well think of him can we?
sentences.cn: 我们不能就这么直接地告诉他我们到底是怎么看他的，是吧？

sentences.en: Your mother is a jolly, easy - going woman.
sentences.cn: 你母亲是个乐呵呵的容易相处的妇人.

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)作乐；寻欢作乐，玩个痛快
海盗旗（饰有白色骷髅的黑旗）
(英，非正式)（尤指恼怒时用以强调）实在，的确，一定

trans.tran_cn: 快活的，兴高采烈的，愉快的，有趣的
寻欢作乐，奉承，逢迎，皇家陆战队兵士，老富豪
（口）用好话劝某人做…；（口）用好话使高兴
